name: Forest Scamper!
description:
You are a fox! In the forest! And you are scampering through it.

There are hedgehogs! In the forest! And you have to jump over them by pressing the spacebar.

If you don't jump over the hedgehogs while you are scampering, YOU DIE.

Can you beat 15,000 points? Is it even possible? Who knows! It's a game about a fox for Foxie Jam.
